name: Classic Black Chiffon Hijab
description: A timeless black hijab crafted from premium soft chiffon material. Perfect for daily wear and special occasions, offering elegant draping and breathable comfort.

name: Silk Rose Printed Scarf
description: Delicate rose patterns on luxurious silk blend fabric. This versatile scarf can be styled as a hijab or fashion accessory with sophisticated appeal.

name: Golden Shimmer Hijab
description: Elegant hijab with subtle golden shimmer threads woven throughout. Perfect for evening events and celebrations, adding a touch of glamour to modest fashion.

name: Navy Cotton Blend Hijab
description: Professional navy blue hijab made from breathable cotton blend. Ideal for work and formal settings with its sophisticated color and comfortable fit.

name: Ivory Lace Trim Hijab
description: Pure ivory hijab with delicate hand-sewn lace trim along the edges. Perfect for weddings, religious ceremonies, and formal occasions.

name: Burgundy Satin Finish Hijab
description: Rich burgundy hijab with luxurious satin finish. The deep wine color complements all skin tones and adds elegance to autumn and winter outfits.

name: Emerald Green Geometric Scarf
description: Vibrant emerald green hijab featuring modern geometric patterns. Made from eco-friendly fabric with contemporary designs for the modern modest woman.

name: Lavender Embroidered Hijab
description: Soft lavender hijab with intricate floral embroidery details. The delicate stitching and gentle color create a serene and graceful appearance.

name: Pearl White Silk Hijab
description: Premium pearl white silk hijab with natural luster. Lightweight and breathable, perfect for summer wear and special occasions requiring elegance.

name: Dusty Rose Crinkle Hijab
description: Beautiful dusty rose hijab with natural crinkle texture. No-iron fabric that maintains its elegant appearance throughout the day with minimal care.
